message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm on a tight budget, and I'm not sure I can go as high as $180.
Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $90 is quite low. How about we meet in the middle at $150?
I'm still a bit short on budget, so I'd be willing to go up to $100. Can you meet me there?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  How about we split the difference again and settle at $125? That's my final offer.
I'm not sure I can go any higher than $100. I'd be happy to buy the product from John for $120 if we can't come to an agreement. Can you meet me at $100?
